name: Storybricks, the storytelling online RPG
blurb: Storybricks is the toolset that allows users to tell stories in a computer RPG and share them with friends.

rewards.reward: A digital copy of the release version of the Storybricks toolset for PC or Mac plus 1 year of premium subscription (a significant discount).
A digital copy of the release version of the Storybricks toolset, 1 year of premium subscription, and a special in-game cosmetic item for your character.
Access to the Beta version of the Storybricks toolset, 2 years of premium subscription for the release version, and a backer-only cosmetic item for your character.

Access to the Beta version of the Storybricks toolset, 3 years of premium subscription for the release version, a backer-only cosmetic item for your character, and a limited edition Storybricks T-shirt.

Collector's Edition with Lifetime Subscription.  Access to the Alpha version of the Storybricks toolset, a lifetime premium subscription for the release version, a backer-only cosmetic item for your character, a limited edition Storybricks T-shirt, and an in-game minipet.

Party Edition!  Get alpha access for 6 people with lifetime premium subscriptions for the release version, plus the backer-only cosmetic items for your characters, minipets for everyone, and a special Storybricks dice bag for the GM of the group.

Become the Brick.  Send us a video of you performing an action or expressing an emotion, and we will use that as a reference to put YOU into Storybricks.  You will become a new brick that everyone can use in their stories.

In addition, you will get Alpha access, lifetime premium subscription, the special backer-only cosmetic item, minipet, Storybricks T-shirt and dice bag.

Action is subject to approval by the Storybricks team.

Guild Edition.  You and 49 of your closest friends get Alpha access to Storybricks, lifetime premium subscriptions, in-game backer-only cosmetic item and minipet, plus five ultra-limited Storybricks hoodies for the guild officers.

An Artist Commission.  A special commissioned ink drawing of YOUR character by the visionary RPG artist Liz Danforth!  You send her a description and references and you get a unique keepsake.


Plus, you get access to the Alpha version of the Storybricks toolset, a lifetime premium subscription, a backer-only cosmetic item for your character, in-game minipet, a limited edition Storybricks T-shirt.

NOTE: Date indicates Alpha access, your commissioned artwork may ship later.

Add a Character to the Kingdom.  You help design a character archetype for the Kingdom of Default: maybe a misunderstood necromancer or vicious maiden.  Describe your character concept and we will put it into the game, with a custom skin and behaviors.\r\n\r\nPlus, you get access to the Alpha version of the Storybricks toolset, a lifetime premium subscription, a backer-only cosmetic item for your character, in-game minipet, a limited edition Storybricks T-shirt.

What do you get besides our undying gratitude?  How about dinner with legendary animators Don Bluth & Gary Goldman, the magical artist Liz Danforth, and the designers of Storybricks.  Up to three people take part in this tremendous opportunity to spend an evening talking to the creative minds behind Storybricks.

Plus, you get access to the Alpha version of the Storybricks toolset, a lifetime premium subscription, a backer-only cosmetic item for your character, in-game minipet, a limited edition Storybricks T-shirt, and the ultra-premium hoodie.

NOTE: Date indicates Alpha access, the date of the dinner is to be determined.  You must be able to travel to Phoenix, AZ, USA.
